entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Pemberton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pemberton Airport 03:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

Humidity: 87 %

Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:02 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy with risk of freezing rain. Snowfall amount 30 to 40 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:02 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
